text: Ball State University is a public, coeducational university in Muncie, Indiana. The university has about 21,401 students. It was founded in 1918. The current president of the university is Jo Ann M. Gora. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Cardinals. They have 18 varsity teams and they compete in the Mid-American Conference. ==Other websites== *Ball State University's Official website *Ball State Cardinals' Official athletics website Category:Mid-American Conference Category:Colleges and universities in Indiana Category:1918 establishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in Indiana
title: Ball State University
